title: br
text:
make sure you have pre-commits installed
use template https://github.com/fastai/nbdev-template
create env python -m venv br-env
activate env source br-env/bin/activate
install stuff pip install nbdev pre-commit
update settings.ini see this
added .pre-commit-config.yaml
install pre-commit hooks: pre-commit install
clean up index.ipynb ({{}} did not get picked up correctly?)
add dependencies in settings.ini and run to install package locally pip install -e '.[dev]'

title: core
text:
Dependencies
Breakfast roll package uses OpenAI Dall-E for image generation. We might consider alternative implementation in the future
let’s make sure things are working as expected on their side

from IPython.display import Image, display


prompt = "An astronaut lounging in a tropical resort in space, pixel art"
model = "dall-e-3"

response = openai.OpenAI().images.generate(prompt=prompt, model=model)

# Display the image from the URL
display(Image(url=response.data[0].url))





source

generate_image

 generate_image (additional_elements:List[str]=[])

Here’s an example of simple usage

display(Image(url=generate_image()))




You can also ask for additional things in the image

display(Image(url=generate_image(additional_elements=["tea", "milk"])))





Tests

test_fail(lambda: generate_image(additional_elements=["avocado"]), contains="not allowed")

client = TestClient(br_starlette)
